page.title: 0112 MILES WEST OF LONDON
page.content: CRANFORD,BEDFONT AND FELTHAM ARE THE MOST WESTERLY PARTS OF THE LONDON BOROUGH OF HOUNSLOW.THE BOROUGH ITSELF LIES ABOUT 12 MILES TO THE WEST OF LONDON. THE MOST DOMINANT FEATURE IN THE AREA IS HEATHROW AIRPORT.IT COVERS AN AREA OF NEARLY 3,000 ACRES AND HAS A PERIMETER ROAD OF 9.3 MILES. IT IS THE MAJOR EMPLOYER IN THE AREA HAVING NEARLY 52,000 WORKERS. THERE IS ONE LARGE COMMUNITY SCHOOL WITHIN CRANFORD AND SEVERAL JUNIOR AND INFANT SCHOOLS WHICH FEED IT. MANY LEISURE ACTIVITIES ARE OFFERED IN THE AREA EITHER AT THE COMMUNITY SCHOOL OR IN THE LOCAL PARKS AND LIBRARIES.THESE INCLUDE SPORTS OF ALL KINDS,DRAMA,LITERATURE AND CULTURAL ACTIVITIES.
